Class Draw

java.lang.Object
us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.graphics.Draw
public class Draw extends Object
Class to create all the drawings and graphics. Runs the 3D transformation code and organises the 3D elements before drawing them.

  • Constructor Details

    • Draw

      public Draw(Graphics graphics, int width, int height)
      Class constructor. Takes the Graphics object provided by the paint method in the drawSpace class as well as the frame's width and height.
      Parameters:
      graphics - current Graphics object
      width - width of the frame
      height - height of the frame

      Parameters:

    • modifyFocus

      public static void modifyFocus(int change)
      Toggles through the array of bodies. Alters the focus field, which stores the index of the focused body in the bodyArray.
      Parameters:
      change - whether to increase or decrease the index

    • toggleLogScale

      public static void toggleLogScale()

    • toggleVerboseOut

      public static void toggleVerboseOut()

    • drawAll

      public void drawAll()
      Draws everything. Operates in the following order:
      1. Scales and transforms the Graphics object's coordinate system as required by the defined scale of the view and the 3D origin point.
      2. 3D axes to aid with orientation.
      3. Draws the physical bodies and their trails. Uses the Graphics3D class to get the Line and Point objects describing the elements to be rendered. These objects are added to an array which sorts the elements by their apparent depth before finally rendering them on the screen.
      4. Adds a 2D crosshair at the center of the screen, as well as tick marks to indicate scale.
